title: GetModuleFrameIndex (Method)
text:
METHOD GetModuleFrameIndex : INT
The implementation of this method is created by the composer during generation
and returns the frame index of the page visualization of a given module.
If the module has no page visualization or a
page visualization cannot be identified -1 is returned.

rows.Name: hnd
rows.Comment:
The module handle for which the page visu frame index
shall be returned
